name: Takala Mika
description: Am easy going, intuitive, and funny. i love the outdoors, going fishing, playing pant ball with friends and seeing movies. I also love the indoors, playing games with friends, watching movies, or just sitting down doing absolutely nothing as long as it is with someone. Life throws many rocks, you just have to figure out how not to be hit, lol. I am rarely sad as life is an adventure,right now am uk now back from business trip,as you know our job is to keep peace,but if I do get sad I write my emotions on paper and cheer up. One of my main goals in life is to be happy and make the others in my life happy as well, mostly with laughter or the occasional massage…
